title: You can get paid £4,000 for wearing slippers all day as new job launches
text:

Good news if you're a fan of comfy feet, a new job has just launched offering people the chance to make serious cash for wearing slippers more.

On offer for the lucky applicant is £333.33 a month for spending 12 hours testing slippers - working out at almost £4,000 a year from sleep and loungewear firm Bedroom Athletics .

The better news is you also get to keep the slippers after.

Bedroom Athletics director Howard Wetter said: “Being paid to do nothing but wear slippers all day might seem like a fairly trivial job, but it’s extremely important to us here that our products are of optimum comfort for those choosing to order from our website.

"We therefore believe that welcoming an official brand tester to our team will be invaluable in gaining insight and feedback for the continual improvement of our slippers.”

(Image: Getty)

If you get the job, you're sent a range of slippers so you can give the team at Bedroom Athletics feedback on them.

To produce your reviews, assessments and ratings, you'll need to wear the slippers for at least 12 hours during a 24-hour period.

The applicant taking on the role will be required to wear and feedback on such items as our classic faux fur slipper boots, memory foam slippers, classic mule slippers and moccasin designs.

"We want each and every one of our slippers to be as comfortable, warm and luxurious as the next," Wetter said.

"Members of the public who often get cold feet would be perfect candidates, especially as we head into the colder months, as we want to make sure we’re keeping all our customers toes cosy during winter.”

If you're interested, you can apply here
description: Slipper lovers rejoice - a sleepwear brand is offering people the chance to earn money by wearing slippers more. And, yes, the slippers are included
